text: Mara'iyama-tanaya masiha sudhu ekajana rasula. Tara age bahu rasula gata hayechena [1] ebam tamra ma atyanta satya nistha chilena. Tara dujane'i kha'oya-da'oya karatena [2]. Dekhanu amara tadera jan'ya ayataguloke kemana bistaritabhabe barnana kari; tarapara'o dekhuna, tara kibhabe satyabimukha haya
